title: Ticket #7454: Add 'json' mode to condor_token_request_list
description:
We don't currently have python bindings for condor_token_request_list; the man page also states (correctly) that the current output format is meant to be human-readable and not meant to be stable or the format to be relied upon.

When working on some OSG topics, I found myself wanting to script this workflow - requiring a machine-readable output from this tool. Let's add JSON support!
remarks:
